item.title: Crashed car abandoned blocking bike path, 30th July
item.description:
A damaged car has been left blocking the cycle path and part of the footway. It has been here for a week. The position of the car is extremely dangerous for cyclists who need to join the main carriageway (where cars are going 40mph+) to get past.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Homerton Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very dangerous tee, 30th July
item.description:
This tree has been brought to the Council numerous times in the past few years and nothing has been done. Now the tree has split through the middle and is about to fall and cause damage and even could hurt someone. 30 years and no one cared for it. I have mentioned several times. Please do something, it does not matter if it is private property as vehicles, persons and properties will be damaged if it falls. Does it need to fall and injure someone or something before something is done. It is a dumping ground right now and is so dangerous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 108A, Ridgeway West, Falconwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unbelievable amount of rubbish on street, 30th July
item.description:
Due to overflowing bins and terrible behaviour of local residents there is a ridiculous amount of litter strewn across the whole of Dove Row. This needs cleaning up, all along the road. Bins need collecting more regularly and ideally more of them

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dove Row, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Community bicycle pump broken, 30th July
item.description:
